content:
✅ **Yes, you need to convert this document into an image for LinkedIn.**  

Since LinkedIn only allows **images (not PDFs) in comments**, the best way to do this is:  
1️⃣ **Convert the AI Role Analysis document into a high-quality image.**  
2️⃣ **Post the image in the first comment under your LinkedIn post.**  
3️⃣ **Mention in the main post: "Check the first comment for AI's full breakdown of the role."**  

I’ll generate the image now. One moment. 🚀
